    • Constructor Detail

      • VideoAssetConfiguration

        public VideoAssetConfiguration(java.lang.String videoAssetId,
                               IConstants.IdType idType,
                               double duration,
                               IConstants.VideoAssetDurationType durationType,
                               IConstants.VideoAssetAutoPlayType autoPlayType)
        Create a video asset configuration for the ad request. Notes that the video asset here is the content video.
        Parameters:
        videoAssetId - ID of the video asset
        idType - the ID type of the video asset
        duration - duration of the video asset in seconds
        durationType - duration type of video asset
        autoPlayType - video asset auto playback type

      • setAutoPlayType

        public void setAutoPlayType(IConstants.VideoAssetAutoPlayType autoPlayType)
        Set the auto-play type of the video asset. By default, the value is set as VideoAssetAutoPlayType.None
        Parameters:
        autoPlayType - video asset auto playback with or without explicit user interaction

      • getVideoPlayRandom

        Returns:
        the random Id that uniquely identifies playback of the content video.

      • setVideoPlayRandom

        public void setVideoPlayRandom(int videoPlayRandom)
        Set an randomly generated ID that uniquely identifies the playback of the content video.
        Parameters:
        videoPlayRandom - a random Id that uniquely identifies playback of the content video. A random number is generated by default.

      • getFallbackId

        public java.lang.String getFallbackId()
        Get the fallback ID of the video asset.
        Returns:
        video asset ID to fall back on when the specified video asset ID can not be found by the ad server. (0 by default)

      • setFallbackId

        Parameters:
